title: Can't launch LoL
body:
I can't launch LoL. I press the button and it just makes the familiar sound. I restarted my laptop, did not work. I reinstalled LoL, it did not work. 
Help please! I would highly appreciate this.

replies.body: i just made the client check for corrupted files and such and took about 2 hrs but after that fix it worked fine. no need to go through the files and sheit
Have you got it working yet? My friend has the same problem
Yes I have, if he has BitDefender. It blocks LoL from launching.
i have the same issue atm, i get to the launcher and i click launch and it disappears and nothing happens.

> [{quoted}](name=Acheron,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1iZiu953,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-30T10:28:58.439+0000)
>
> i have the same issue atm, i get to the launcher and i click launch and it disappears and nothing happens.

You can  try going to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends and running lol.launcher.admin.exe - if prompted for admin rights, hit "Yes". If this launcher works, simply replace your shortcuts with this one.

If that doesn't work, follow these steps:
1. Go to your League of Legends directory ("C:\Riot Games\League of Legends" by default)
2. Go to "RADS/Projects" and delete "lol_air_client"
3. Launch "lol.launcher.admin.exe" - let it patch
